name: Squishy2
description:
An improvement from the previous game Squishy. Improvements include:

  • An additional tutorial level
  • Cosmetic changes for collectables, levels, enemies and menus
  • NavMesh rebakes and slight level design changes
  • Other minor bug fixes

Music downloaded from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/music/

All player, enemy, and child assets downloaded from Unity Assets Store at: https://assetstore.unity.com/3d

Background, textures, and star collectable designed by ourselves.
